page.title: 07Kilsby May Day
page.content: { May Day { }The School Parent's Association organises the May Day each year. There is a Fancy Dress parade to the school led by the May Queen. There are games to play. In the evening there is a Barn Dance. {Morris Dancing { }The boys from the top class are all in the team. We did 3 dances, two with handkerchiefs and one with sticks. We all dressed in white with bells around our legs. Mr,Rose dressed up as the horse and had to try and put us off with a bladder on a stick. {Maypole Dancing} The girls do the Maypole Dancing. They dance around the pole and weave different patterns. The May Queen and her attendants wear their long dresses as they haven't time to change. The rest wear either red or blue and white
